channel.title: recoding macros on Mark Gingrass Blog
channel.description: Recent content in recoding macros on Mark Gingrass Blog

item.title: Dynamic Ranges and Modifying Recorded Macros
item.description: Build Templates In this tutorial, we will build upon the use of ranges and combine recording macros with modifying your own macros. In this tutorial you will learn the basics of: Adding formulas from VBA to Excel Dynamic Ranges Modifying Recorded Macros Selection object Watch the Video for step by step instructions. [embed]https://youtu.be/q8u4BlB2D2g[/embed] Code Copy and paste the code below to get you started.
